website_summaries.verdict: Though others on our list may be less fattening, this is the top pick for those who prefer sweet treats.
pros: If you are shopping for someone with a sweet tooth, look no further
This gift basket gets high marks for the variety of candy, chocolate covered pretzels, caramel corn that's arranged attractively in a reusable sea grass basket
cons: The portion sizes of some of the items is a bit small
Depending on weather conditions, chocolate items could arrive slightly melted

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for the chocolate lover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my neighbors. It is awesome! Package is rather heavy and completely packed with goodies not filler fluff. I included a photo with my reading glasses on top to give an idea of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Shana B. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything in the box was dark chocolate, however there was no mention of dark chocolate in the description. My box actually had almond bark and cashews.. This would be helpful to know when ordering due to allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: VERY OLD AND HARD
customer_reviews.text: VERY OLD AND HARD PEANUT BRITTLE AND STALE EVERYTHING ELSE! MY GRANNY SAID FOR ME NEVER TO BUY OR SEND THIS TO HER AGAIN! I WANT A REFUND!
customer_reviews.author: Melyn123

customer_reviews.title: What a waste..
customer_reviews.text: Upsetting, this was to be a gift for someone that is having surgery. When I opened the package that was just delivered the ice packet inside was hot. The package is ruined and the chocolate is melted. Weird being there is a sticker on the outside of the box stating that the driver needs to handle with care and it is perishable and fragile. What a waste..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing the brittle and the ribbon!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very misleading. The decorative ribbon and the peanut brittle was missing! That is not okay!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: !!️Don’t purchase this item!!️
customer_reviews.text: !!️PLEASE READ MY REVIEW!!️ Do not purchase this item. Bought two for Mother’s Day. One for my Mom in Michigan & the other for my Mother in law in Ohio. They both received the items stale, melted, open and old. My mother in law say some of the food had discoloration because it was so old. Please save your money & purchase an edible arrangement instead. I hate that I spent so much money to be extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Arrived fast (2 days) a week before Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to Michigan in the winter for Christmas so there was no concerns about melting. I have Amazon Prime and ordered this on a Saturday and it was here in 2 days on Monday. The size is what I expected. Everything looks good. If for some reason it doesn't taste as good as it looks, I'll update this.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Stale peanut products.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very disappointing gift basket. Caramel popcorns were tasty and the pretzels were okay, but all the covered nut products tasted terribly stale. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RescueMa

customer_reviews.title: My Dad Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for father's day 2016. He loved it! He said it had so much to choose from and everything was delicious! It was much bigger than I expected. It was also delivered with ice packs to keep everything from melting, which I was very thankful for. It took a week to get to my dad even though it was supposed to be 2 day shipping, that's only reason I gave it four stars instead of five. But all together a great gift and I would definitely buy it again, I'd just order a little earlier next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice; Fresh; but Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Would not have ordered anything with toffee, which was substituted for peanut brittle and / or peanut clusters. On the other hand, the pretzels and chocolate cashews are fresh and tasty. Have no feedback on other items yet. High review for "FRESH".
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very good stuff. The white yogurt pretzels are very good, the chocolate covered pretzels are just ok, the peanut brittle is very good along with the dark chocolate with tiny almond pieces (it doesn’t have big pieces of almonds like in their picture) chocolate covered raisins are great too, the caramel & chocolate caramel popcorn is good but sweet, there is stuffing on the bottom of the basket, this is a nice gift basket although it is overpriced at $37, I think $25 would be a more appropriate price for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: QC

customer_reviews.title: A very good gift
customer_reviews.text: I sent this Gift Basket to friends. They were delighted. They took a photo of it and sent it to me. Looks like a very good and plentiful assortment. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JaneFairlight

customer_reviews.title: It was supposed to be a gift, but I ended up eating the whole thing...=(
customer_reviews.text: Soooo I bought this for an xmas gift and ended up pigging out on it. I love sweets and my sweet-tooth got the best of me. *smacks forehead* But it was so worth all the sugar and guilt afterwards. I ended up prob gaining 5 pounds and probably subtracted 2 years off of my life. Oh well.....You only live once.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift, but for several people. There are so many good things in the basket that I knew I could get several gifts out of one basket. It arrived quickly. However, I wish they had mentioned there was dark chocolate popcorn AND dark chocolate bars inside. No one in my family likes dark chocolate. And WHY were those 6 small bars glued to each other with some sort of industrial glue that you could use to glue a cannon ball to the wall? Trying to separate them squished them and I had to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I ordered, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The picture of what I wanted to order had a nicer looking package and the ingredients didn't add up to what I thought it would. It was supposed to be a Chocolate Caramel and Crunch Grand Gift Basket for Christmas Holiday. What cThere was no peanut brittle at all. I was so disappointed! Definitely not worth the money. There were no individual caramels and a lot of dark chocolates which they don't like. It was supposed to have a lot more variety in it. I won't do this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Great buy delish and impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my mom and dummy me sent to my own house. We LOVED it!! Chocolate was good quality and was everything someone with a sweet tooth would want. Chocolate covered pretzels white and milk?? Plus chocolate covered popcorn and raisins I think. My daughter devoured them... you get the point. All edible and absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.author: Lauren J

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I sent each of my daughters families one of these baskets and they were impressed with the quality of the contents and even the gift basket itself. Both families were stressing under quarantine and I thought that this would break up the tedium and it definitely did! The kids loved the chocolate covered pretzels with their parents. The two year old thanked me with a chocolate covered smile. This really lifted their spirits and my daughters were impressed with the contents. I will send again!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Melted.. no regard from shipper!
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a great gift however all was melted!!!!! I want my money back! Ice pack completely melted too! Within a couple days?????????? Seriously? Spend over 40 bucks and this is what I get for my mother on mother's day?
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: A very good thank you gift
customer_reviews.text: This product was actually nicer than the picture depicts. The individual that I sent this gift to was very impressed and happy with everything in it. I was very pleased with the quality of the product and will definitely send it again in the future. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M. O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: A great thank-you gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my neighbor as a thank you for taking care of my dogs. When they opened it, they were truly surprised and happy. It's filled with goodies and weighs a good amount. Perfect for the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Brahmology, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gift baskets because they are good-looking and presentable. All of my gift baskets arrived without the red ribbons, so the baskets look generic and boring.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNHAPPY
customer_reviews.text: This was a get well gift to my daughter after surgery. We were very unhappy to see what had arrived. It was small and not worth the money. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived super fast and in perfect shape! Everything was cool because of the ice pack. Perfect for a gift to an office. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby P.

customer_reviews.title: Not As Expected
customer_reviews.text: So glad this did not arrive on time. I was going to give as a gift and it arrived to late so I kept it. The food was stale and overall not as nice as pictured. I don’t recommend it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Eiserle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible timing for its quality.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived late. I placed it ahead of time. I kept receiving notifications that it was going to arrive a certain day & then over & over & It finally arrived several weeks after. The chocolate were melted together nothing was edible anymore. It’s overpriced as well. I thought it would be a great gift but needed up throwing it away. Waste of my $ I reached out to amazon for options all They said is this item is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for mother's day and she was very happy. I think it lasted maybe 2 days 😂😂. I would definitely order from this company again. I also got a different one for my grandmother and she loves hers as well. My mom and grandma are big snackers and they truly enjoyed this product
customer_reviews.author: Jarred M Sherry

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT GIFT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift basket as a Mother’s Day gift for my mom and my family. My 91 year old mom loves chocolate. She was very excited and thrilled to receive it. Lots of goodies to choose from. She loved everything. Bit pricey but worth it for my mom. Definitely recommend. Makes nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely superb! Due to how shipping is right now it did come late....however this company sent me a 2nd one for free!!!! Absolutely wonderful company!! The basket the candy was in is made beautifully and all the sweets were remarkably delicious!! I will most definitely be placing more orders for Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Already received it. Not on its way!
customer_reviews.text: Is a very nice baset. I hope I can use it for a vegetable arrangement of my garden ever grows. I should be able to use it to hold what I pick for the day! But do you charge it as a food item or a basket? Food is not taxed. Have already received it and it says not.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E. Gray

customer_reviews.title: My 5th one
customer_reviews.text: I send these at the drop of a hat. Everybody loves chocolate! The variety of this gift is what’s sure to please. Almond bark? Chocolate covered cashews? Plus,plus. Come on! One day I’ll buy one for myself. 🏆
customer_reviews.author: EMMA LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase to surprise the home bound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 83 year old step-father who is homebound. Something he could snack on while watching TV. The phone call I received from him was a definite 5 star. He loved it joking that he'd have to hide it from his caregiver because he wanted it for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Presentation...not enough product
customer_reviews.text: This was sent as a Christmas gift to the folks back in the states as I'm in another country. When the gift was received, the presentation was excellent but sadly there was barely any sweets for the price you pay. Majority of it was shredded paper and I was very disappointed as this was an amazon choice. Would not recommend and would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my neighbor. They told me that they loved it and it was a nice present. Even though I didn’t see the product, I’m happy because the people I gave this gift to loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy N

customer_reviews.title: Best gift basket!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I must say this is one of the best if not the best gift basket I ever purchased. It was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she loved it. Everything was fresh, not melted. Generous portions. Price is well worth it. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Not always what you get
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that when I first ordered this product it was by far one of my favorite gift baskets to get for myself as a treat and also to my friends for special occasions. However I’ve noticed over time that you never really get exactly what is in the picture. Some of my favorites are always being replaced for another item. I have to say I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Zizi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this to my dad for Fathers Day. Despite the label saying perishable on it, it was hand delivered and the box was very warm to the touch from the carrier. Sadly everything is melted. I’m sure this would have been a great product, but keep in mind if your ordering during a warmer season you might not get the best quality once it’s delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice item. The various components varied from good to very good. The bottom line is the packaging was very good, the shipping was fast and the variety was tasty and very good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Roche

customer_reviews.title: Worked out well for me!
customer_reviews.text: Despite some of the other reviews, I took my chances and bought this as a gift for my neighbor. She sent me a picture and I’m very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Everything tasted so good! Wrapped perfectly and packaging was on point! The basket the snacks came in is nice as well ! Perfect to send as a gift or treat yourself. Would be good for movie nights too !
customer_reviews.author: Kawaiimami

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate looked good for the most part. However, the upper left packet of chocolate was white and not brown due to being left in delivery truck all day. The ice pack and insulation did not help despite the extra cost as the ice pack had completely melted and left water droplets on the inside of the packaging even though the plastic was still intact. These items should be better delivered to account for this especially when charging so much extra to avoid this happening. I did not return but I would have if it was easier and I did not timely need the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Barnett’s gift box
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. Sent out a few and everyone loved the diversity. I am now a confirmed Barnett’s gift buyer. It’s fresh taste good and delivered perfect
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: Pictures misleading
customer_reviews.text: While the actual contents look delicious (I'll be giving as a gift, so I have not sampled), there is a lot of paper "filler" in the box that is not visible in the pictures from the seller. I did not expect most of the box to consist of the cardboard-colored, confetti-like filling. The quantity and quality of the snacks appear as described and is enough to make for a thoughtful gift for several office staff, which is where this gift will be going. I am upset that the photos are so misleading, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kor

customer_reviews.title: Great thank you gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a company I frequent and they absolutely loved it. All around amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Parker Kids

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: My mom LOVED this gift basket! I usually sending her a chocolate gift box tower but I read horrible reviews about it here and after feeling extremely guilty for sending my poor mom crap chocolate for the past few years I looked for the highest rated basket in Amazon and found this. This year I got a chance to have my mom home to open gifts so I got to see the box. It's a beautiful basket of goodies. And she was very excited about it. And all of my children tried their darndest to trick her into opening it so they could eat it. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MLW

customer_reviews.title: De Lish Us!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice assortment of sweets that everyone will find a favorite treat. Its a great value for the price. Don't be concerned to order this!
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy961

customer_reviews.title: Gift basket
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t actually consume this product. But I sent it to my parents over Christmas and they raves about it. Sounded like it was good amount delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good gift for sugar lovers
customer_reviews.text: Looked just like the picture. The food was good. Wasn't old or stale tasting. The presentation was just like the picture shown. Good gift
customer_reviews.author: eviltwin

customer_reviews.title: Good & BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Family members was so HAPPY to receive once product arrived. They said it was beautiful and food was good
customer_reviews.author: Vernetta Beard

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged and fresh
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about recieving it cause people said it melted sometimes. I recieved my gift inside a box that was inside a box that was packed with insulation and a big ice pack. Chocolate is salty and sweet!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my new neighbors. I love the packaging and the gift assortments Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift!
customer_reviews.text: If I could describe this in one word I honestly wouldnt be able to. It's delicious, savory, amazing, and a wonderful gift for anyone you know. I was a bit put off by some of the reviews but I had no issues at all! It's a wonderful little gift box and so far, my dad loves the flavor of the peanut brittle and the caramel popcorn!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and very unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so unhappy. We sent this to my mother in law for Mother’s Day and she just text us this: Thank you so much it’s a be Just want you to know I’m contacting the company because everything is melted. It was in styrofoam box with a little ice pack. It just arrived but it’s been in truck all day the and it’s 102. I’m so sorry wanted you to know. Very unhappy and disappointed. So it’s a waste of money and gift. Now we need to figure out another gift to send to her and it will be late. 😢 Plus I’m hoping we get a refund or another basket sent to her that’s not melted.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy costumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a friend after her mom passed. This gift arrived quickly and my friend said that it was a perfect gift for her family instead of flowers. Will keep this in my list for future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I ORDER
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his b-day back in February and he loved it so I did a reorder , but this time it had different things and I was not happy. But over all its great I will reorder it again I like this basket. My husband loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Golladay

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Gift Basket!
customer_reviews.text: Gift basket was perfect. Packaging included ice pack which kept it from melting. And everything was delicious!! Definitely recommend. Happy customer here! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lee

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate covered snacks? I think yes.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put. This make for a fantastic gift for any occasion, and also a nice treat for yourself. If you're looking to get someone something for a birthday, special event, celebrations engagement, or anything, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice as presents
customer_reviews.text: Very fancy. I have 4 women I work with, and I was not sure these would be nice enough for our partners. But they all agreed, these were very nice. We gave out 4 at Christmas time.
customer_reviews.author: RDKMD

customer_reviews.title: Trust reviews og others
customer_reviews.text: No white chocolate pretzels! One viewer said falsely advertised, I should have listened. I ordered this because it was supposed to be a variety of chocolate. No it's just dark chocolate and popcorn disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: R. nyc

customer_reviews.title: Good but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: The snacks were good but there is not as much as you would think by looking at the pictures. There is just a thin layer of the snacks on top and a lot of paper under them. I paid $40 for this but I think it is worth more like $25. I would not buy it again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: We got these as a gift. It was well packaged and delicious. We will get more in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to my best friend for her birthday and she said it cake presented well and tasted good. Worked for her!
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN BAEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great gift basket
customer_reviews.text: This was a great basket to send to my friend who has been going through a hard time. It was delivered 2 days before expected. I wish it let me leave a message but it didnt. Besides that, she said the snacks were fresh and it came rapped up real nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Chanie Chriqui

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wonderful gift for my mom for Mother's day and she absolutely loved the whole package! The presentation was pretty and enticing, the item products were very delicious, and the shipping had the basket well protected and was shipped with a cold pack to keep the chocolate from melting. I highly recommend this item as a gift for any chocolate, sweet-tooth lover!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The basket you get with this product is half full of shredded paper then each different item is laid on top, making you think that the basket is full, until you open it and find it's half paper. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyT1950

customer_reviews.title: Freshness
customer_reviews.text: After ordering one for myself, I have sent these as gifts and everyone loved the flavor and freshness. Highly recommend as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product at 3 different times for family/friends, and have absolutely nothing negative to say about it. Nothing but raves about how delicious everything in each basket was fresh and very good tasting! I would certainly recommend this food product to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: sek..k

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the box looks fuller than it actually is. There is only a scant top layer of snacks and the rest is filler or box. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Delishes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a get well for my brother. I forgot his wife was on a diet. I cancelled. Ordered nuts instead. They ended up with both gifts. I think they loved this one more. It was gone with in 24 hrs if that tells you anything! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Haeck

customer_reviews.title: Presentation
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing presentation, came on time for my mothers day surprise 😊 with a mom who loves chocolate and dark in particular this was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: MadisonSweets

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: The box does not have the white chocolate pretzels and it’s all dark chocolate. It does NOT contain what the description says. SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie DeAtley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was really nice for the price. I would buy this again for a gift next year again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Gift baskets should not have sticker price
customer_reviews.text: How a Gift Basket get to the recipient with the receipt attached and without the gift card?
customer_reviews.author: Calibello

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Gift for Christmas and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: dickens10

customer_reviews.title: The individual wrapping
customer_reviews.text: U love how everything was individually wrapped and I can portion out my goodies
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hogans

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: O ordered as a gift to be delivered , they really like it
customer_reviews.author: Faridi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I was in a tough spot after ordering this because I realized I had accidentally included my own address even though this was meant to be sent to someone else. I didn't realize this until the shipping day. Thankfully, I e-mailed and called Golden State (I was nervous and wanted to have my bases covered) and from both sides I had amazing service and they were able to contact the warehouse it was being shipped from to make the last-minute change. I've had the exact opposite experience with other companies with even further notice so I was pleasantly surprised how responsive they were. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: andrew.m

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my sister for Christmas. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Random Reviews

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift!. It is very delicious as well. I only wish that they didnt put all the crinkled paper underneath the items. The basket is reusable. Everything tasted amazing. A little expensive, but that's what you have to pay for good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Complete letdown.
customer_reviews.text: Lame, especially for the price. I don't know how this got 4.5 stars with all the negative reviews. I didn't get any white chocolate pretzels, some of the items are stale, overall dollar store quality. This is a $10 basket of sub standard chocolate. Don't let the 4.5 stars fool you too, this is mediocre garbage.
customer_reviews.author: michael rehn

customer_reviews.title: WRONG ONE SENT CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: I RECENTLY ORDERED ONE AND GOT THE SMALL CHEAPER ONE WITH THE POP CORN IN A BOX ......NOT THE BAG LIKE WHAT WAS DISPLAYED. BEWARE!!!!!!! YOU CANNOT REACH ANYONE IN CUSTOMER.
customer_reviews.author: Truthbetold

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for relative
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for daughter in another city in Texas. She called said it was received she and grandson enjoying snacks. Thanks Amazon for quality product and dependable service.
customer_reviews.author: Nick J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and tasted good
customer_reviews.text: I gave them as a gift. My mom liked them.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Son loved the surprise gift he recieved in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Melted chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone going thru a divorce. Everything came melted. Very disappointing. Any ice packets it was shipped with were warm. I didn't let it sit on my porch either, got it right when it arrived. I honestly dont even want to give it as a gift, I've just been waiting 4 days and everything is closed during covid
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Missing an item
customer_reviews.text: The reason I chose this basket was that it said it had peanut brittle, my mother loves peanut brittle. There is no peanut brittle!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Recipient didn't want to share!
customer_reviews.text: We sent this to our tax man and his wife as a thank you. When she got it, she did not want to share. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C Kresho

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband as a gift. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift. It ended up being a gift for me because I ate most of it. The chocolate pretzels made me weak so so good
customer_reviews.author: Seth Conner

customer_reviews.title: Not the right pretzels
customer_reviews.text: This was good. But super bummed that the pretzels were yogurt and not white chocolate caramel. I feel like if you’re going to sub things out that should be written somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: Really nice selection for the price and a lovely gift to bring to parties offices and doctors offices
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and it was well received. Was seen as high quality, but still a little pricey for what you get in my opinion. Most of the package is packing material rather than actual edibles which left me feeling a little cheated.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Great portion sizes
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift- came fresh and full of a good mix.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Sweet gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad, who has everything, so I couldn't go wrong with this great gift. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: getting the value I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I felt for the price it was rather small in quantity. I bought for a gift and it seems kinda cheap. I guess I should have paid better attention to what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Packaged beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Nice assortment, but most of it tasted a bit stale
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my neighbor as a thank you gift. However, looked too delicious, beautifully wrapped up in a bow within a padded box and ice pack😀Scrumptious !!Just ordered another one for my neighbor 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd time ordering and the service never fails! Ships fast, snacks look perfect! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kabbabe

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: No peanut brittle and all the chocolate was melted. It looked horrible and would never gift this again.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Y
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. They were delivered to Hawaii and were eaten by Hawaiian s. They say they were da bomb!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: They loved our Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Such a lovely gift. Well given and very well recieved. A great, delicious, remembrance for a wonderful family.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but photo makes the pkg look a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but photo makes the pkg look a lot larger. Also each item is wrapped individually and had a very small quantity of each. Not really worth the price. I sent to someone's home for Thanksgiving, and when I saw it, I was very disappointed! I had to buy another tray to add to this to make enough to go around to 10 people!
customer_reviews.author: Sdc

product_meta.title: Chocolate Caramel and Crunch Grand Gift Basket for Valentines, Snack, Business, Office and Family
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate Crunch BasketTwo large bags of hand-popped gourmet gooey caramel corn made with rich, creamy real butter pairs with two bags of sweet chocolatey pretzels and white chocolate, Caramel drizzled pretzels, crunchy peanut brittle, chocolate-covered sea salt Cashews, real chocolate Almond bark, and a half-dozen of ghirardelli's fine individually wrapped chocolate squares. A gift that will delight the whole office or the entire family, there are tasty handfuls of yummy deliciousness, attractively packed into a reusable seagrass basket and tied with a ribbon for perfect holiday or party presentation.
feature_bullets: BEST SELLING DELICIOUSNESS: Thousands upon thousands of gift-givers can't be wrong! One taste of our prized gourmet, gooey caramel corn, including both straight caramel and real-chocolate drizzled, generously heaped into this basket full of favorites, and you will understand why!

HANDMADE CHOCOLATES, HANDMADE CARAMEL CORN. We pop fresh popcorn, melt real Challenge butter and caramel, and drench it in the rich, thick goodness. The melters are full of real chocolates, pouring out pans of chocolate barks, pressing whole almonds into the warm, thick slabs. Nothing but the best will do for our favorite people--our customers--giving to their favorite people!

A GIFT LARGE ENOUGH for the whole office and entire family! Added to the caramel corns and Ghirardelli's finest are heaping handfuls of chocolate-covered sea salt cashews, chocolate-covered pretzels, caramel drizzled pretzels, peanut brittle, and scrumptious handmade chocolate almond bark.
GHIRARDELLI CHOCOLATE SQUARES: A half-dozen assorted dark and caramel real chocolate squares from the famous San Francisco Chocolatier. Renowned chocolates everyone on your list will recognize!
SENDING AS A GIFT? See alternate image for instruction on how to include a gift message. Be sure to sign your name and/or your company, so your recipient knows who to thank!
